REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1229 reute r f BC-ENSERCH-<ENS>-TO-REDE 04-03 0045

TEXT.TITLE: ENSERCH <ENS> TO REDEEM DEBENTURES
TEXT.BODY: Enserch Corp said that it has called for redemption on May four all its outstanding 16-3/8 pct sinking fund debentures due 2007, pursuant to the optional redemption provision of the indenture at 111.981 pct of par. Reuter
